name: Centered Hero
description: Full-width hero section with centered title, subtitle and call-to-action

en.snippet.hero.title: Welcome to Our Website
en.snippet.hero.subtitle: We create amazing digital experiences that help your business grow and succeed in the modern world.

fr.snippet.hero.title: Bienvenue sur notre site
fr.snippet.hero.subtitle: Nous créons des expériences numériques exceptionnelles qui aident votre entreprise à se développer et à réussir dans le monde moderne.

css: .qs-snippet-hero { min-height: 60vh; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); padding: 4rem 2rem; text-align: center; } .qs-snippet-hero-content { max-width: 800px; } .qs-snippet-hero-title { font-size: 3rem; color: #fff; margin: 0 0 1rem; } .qs-snippet-hero-subtitle { font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); margin: 0 0 2rem; line-height: 1.6; } .qs-snippet-hero-actions { display: flex; gap: 1rem; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; } .qs-snippet-btn-lg { padding: 0.875rem 2rem; font-size: 1.1rem; } .qs-snippet-btn-outline { background: transparent; color: #fff; border: 2px solid #fff; } .qs-snippet-btn-outline:hover { background: #fff; color: #667eea; }
